items.question: How to sign up for the procedure
items.answer: You can sign up for the procedure through the form on our website, by calling, or writing to us on Instagram.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept payment in cash and cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express).

items.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time.

items.question: What materials do you use
items.answer: We use only certified premium materials from the world's leading brands.

items.question: Do your craftsmen have certificates?
items.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly take advanced training courses.

items.question: Is preparation necessary before the procedure?
Are there any contraindications to the procedures?
items.answer: Yes, each procedure has its own contraindications.

items.question: Do you provide a guarantee for services
items.answer: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our services.

items.question: Do you have a loyalty program
items.answer: Yes, we have a cumulative loyalty program.

items.question: Do you work on weekends
items.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week.

items.question: Is it possible to give a certificate for services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates for any amount or for specific services.

items.question: Where is your salon located?
items.answer: We are located in the center of Dubai.
